job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You won't just contribute to building our AI engine; you'll also be an integral part of the smooth deployment, scalability, and maintenance of our machine learning solutions. By collaborating closely with medical experts and our dev/ops engineers, you'll bring substantial domain knowledge into vectorial representations and bridge the gap between model development and production.

   You will:
     * Craft, implement, and fine-tune machine learning algorithms, focusing on Retrieval-Augmented Generation and LLM.
     * Partner closely with medical specialists to translate their expertise into our AI engine.
     * Ensure seamless deployment, monitoring, and scalability of our ML models in production environments.
     * Champion robust ML-Ops practices, including continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing for ML systems.
     * Collaborate with our tech team to construct a resilient, scalable infrastructure for our ML solutions.
     * Monitor model performance, ensuring real-time diagnostics and speedy troubleshooting.
     * Stay in the loop with the latest trends in AI, ML, and ML-Ops to continually push our boundaries.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

You won't just contribute to building our AI engine; you'll also be an integral part of the smooth deployment, scalability, and maintenance of our machine learning solutions. By collaborating closely with medical experts and our dev/ops engineers, you'll bring substantial domain knowledge into vectorial representations and bridge the gap between model development and production.

   You will:
     * Craft, implement, and fine-tune machine learning algorithms, focusing on Retrieval-Augmented Generation and LLM.
     * Partner closely with medical specialists to translate their expertise into our AI engine.
     * Ensure seamless deployment, monitoring, and scalability of our ML models in production environments.
     * Champion robust ML-Ops practices, including continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing for ML systems.
     * Collaborate with our tech team to construct a resilient, scalable infrastructure for our ML solutions.
     * Monitor model performance, ensuring real-time diagnostics and speedy troubleshooting.
     * Stay in the loop with the latest trends in AI, ML, and ML-Ops to continually push our boundaries.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and deployment of applications built on top of large language models (LLMs) and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems. While it mentions 'Machine Learning Engineer' in the title, the core responsibilities like 'Craft, implement, and fine-tune machine learning algorithms, focusing on Retrieval-Augmented Generation and LLM,' 'Partner closely with medical specialists to translate their expertise into our AI engine,' and the mention of 'vectorial representations' strongly align with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building user-facing AI systems and integrating generative models. The emphasis on MLOps and production deployment further supports this classification.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Craft, implement, and fine-tune machine learning algorithms, focusing on Retrieval-Augmented Generation and LLM' directly relates to the creation and adaptation of models, specifically generative ones.
job_tasks.phrase: Craft, implement, and fine-tune machine learning algorithms, focusing on Retrieval-Augmented Generation and LLM

job_tasks.phrase: Partner closely with medical specialists to translate their expertise into our AI engine

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure seamless deployment, monitoring, and scalability of our ML models in production environments

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Champion robust ML-Ops practices, including continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing for ML systems' explicitly mentions MLOps practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Champion robust ML-Ops practices, including continuous integration, continuous delivery, and automated testing for ML systems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with our tech team to construct a resilient, scalable infrastructure for our ML solutions' involves building and maintaining the systems that support ML models, which falls under software development for AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with our tech team to construct a resilient, scalable infrastructure for our ML solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Monitor model performance, ensuring real-time diagnostics and speedy troubleshooting' is a key responsibility in maintaining models in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Monitor model performance, ensuring real-time diagnostics and speedy troubleshooting

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'bring substantial domain knowledge into vectorial representations' implies data preprocessing and feature engineering, specifically for generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: bring substantial domain knowledge into vectorial representations

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'bridge the gap between model development and production' implies tasks related to data pipelines and integration, which are part of data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: bridge the gap between model development and production

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Stay in the loop with the latest trends in AI, ML, and ML-Ops' relates to understanding and potentially implementing new data processing and modeling techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay in the loop with the latest trends in AI, ML, and ML-Ops
